text: Is there a way to create conditional alerts based on the status of a webhook? For example if a user submits a form that was successful from the HubSpot front but received a 404 from trial account creation
Does anyone know how to track HubSpot chat bot opens with google analytics?

I found some instructions on HubSpot Community for setting up tracking w/ Tag Manager: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/HubSpot-Livechat-on-Google-Tag-Manager/td-p/240936> Would this be helpful?
